text: Motu Oa ("Long Rock") is a small island, southeast of Ua Pou, in the northern Marquesas Islands in French Polynesia. It is 1100 meters long and up to 460 meters wide at its northern end. Its area is approximately 30 hectares, making it the largest of the satellite islands of Ua Pu. ==See also== * Desert island * List of islands Category:Islands of the Marquesas Islands Category:Uninhabited islands of French Polynesia
title: Motu Oa
